Posts.Content: Mom got her date 25/2 but her blood pressure is so high it might get delayed for another week and she's not happy about the delay I'm trying my best to keep her calm but it's very difficult x
Posts.Title: MOM - Surgery date

Posts.Content: Thanks Alison I have tried to tell her this but she thinks the longer it takes the worse it's getting but the good thing is she lives in a sheltered housing so they have offered to do her BP every second day to keep tabs so I hope when she sees it coming down then she'll relax more and that will help but I don't understand having the surgery date when she hasn't had any of the scan results x
Posts.Title: MOM - Surgery date

Posts.Content: Yes she's having right side mastectomy and full lymph node clearance I have washed and Ironed 3 lots of front opening pj's as she's being kept in for 3 days and over the next week or so I'll make sure she's got blouses and cardigans for home hope you are feeling well and I will give her a big hug from you thanks again for the info x Ann x
Posts.Title: MOM - Surgery date

Posts.Content: Maybe your tear ducts are having a clear out so you can have a positive weekend / mother's day but a cheeky cocktail sounds good to me maybe I'll have one too later and I'll lift my glass to u big cyber hugs hope u feel better x
Posts.Title: Nearly 1 year on - why am I crying?

Posts.Content: Hi my 70 yr old mom was diagnosed in January. The doctor said immediate referral but wouldn't confirm but the doctor at the hospital new before any tests came back and told us to prepare so I just think it's up to the individual doctor on whether or not they're prepared to tell you without the test results. Good luck x
Posts.Title: Can GP tell if a lump is cancer?

Posts.Content: Wouldn't worry about a bra just now just make sure all tops and pj's have buttons at front as lifting arm can be difficult good luck x
Posts.Title: MX on Friday

Posts.Content: Stay away from Google it's awful best info is from all the people here and my mom waited 7 days for her biopsy result they won't call better face to face good luck x
Posts.Title: Average time for results?

Posts.Content: Very interesting makes me glad a don't Google and just ask everyone here x
Posts.Title: Why You Shouldn't Google - 10 Cancer Myths Debunked

Posts.Content: Good luck with your treatment and I hope you enjoyed your eggs big hugs x
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo Today

Posts.Content: Thank you all for talking to me I'm soo glad I've joined this site already u are all very kind. I'm from glasgow Scotland and I've sent for the Macmillan diary to keeps notes as my mother thinks she will get too scared to read up on all the info so I'll do it for her and if she asks a question I don't know then at least I know someone one here will and that's a bit of relief in itself so thanks again x
Posts.Title: MOM

Posts.Content: Karen Ann I'm soo glad your cancer free what a relief u must feel congrats x Sharonslim thanks for the info my husband's cousin is a receptionist at the beatson so once I get my head round everything I'm gonna give her a wee visit to find out more thank x
Posts.Title: MOM

Posts.Content: That's great I have a kindle which I throw in her lap each visit she's only playing games just now but I think that'll be her mother's day gift x
Posts.Title: Feel like a fraud on this site

Posts.Content: Well if anyone on this forum is a fraud then I must win as I post for my 70 yr old mother who refuses to learn how to use the internet but I still post and these wonderful and inspirational people have welcomed me with open arms so you post till your hearts content and well all help each other big hugs x
Posts.Title: Feel like a fraud on this site

Posts.Content: Hi everyone just joined this group today I hope it's ok that it's my mother who has breast cancer and not me even tying this is hard.  Found out yesterday.  Scans and bloods and pre open checks over next two weeks. One side masectomy and then radiotherapy as she's just turned 70 they said chemo would be too much for her.  Looking forward to all our chats and all the info my brain can take from all of you x
Posts.Title: MOM

Posts.Content: Thanks for your kind words Louise I think joining this site today and typing about it has just made me realise that this is all very real and we have a long road ahead x Ann
Posts.Title: MOM

Posts.Content: Hi everyone my mom got the dates for her scans Tuesday and Wednesday quick question does anyone know about the reaction that asthmatics get as she has asthma and she has a plate and pins in her ankle if anyone knows about that as it says they need to know about any metal in the body cheers x
Posts.Title: scans and asthma and metal pins

Posts.Content: Good morning flower24 I do hope a good night's sleep has helped you change your mind and your calling the go now your a strong woman and you can call. I'm very sorry about your daughter what an awful thing to go through cyber hugs sent your way x
Posts.Title: I'm Feeling Scared
